MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY7 & KY15 postcode area of Cupar. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm due to faulty overhead line equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:42am on Friday, 20 November 2020
